attributes.review: This app is terrible! After downloading it my pet fly flew away and was never seen again. And when I went outside to play his favorite song on the flute to call him back a raptor came out of no where and slapped it out of my hands. After the raptor swam away and drowned I go back inside to find my house destroyed! So as you can see you should NEVER download this app, unless you want your life ruined. 0/10 worst app ever!
